mapper.select: select c.id as lsryId,d.id as jwryId,e.id as dyId,f.id as jsId,g.id as byId,h.id as xmsfId,i.id as yscxId,j.id as sfId,k.id as sqjz, l.id as zszhId,m.id as xdId,n.id as azbId,o.id as zdqsnId from user a left join person_baseinfo b on a.id_card_num=b.id_card_num LEFT JOIN staypeople_info c ON b.id=c.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN engpeople_info d on b.id=d.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN party_info e on b.id=e.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN bear_info f on b.id=f.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN militaryservice_info g on b.id=g.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN xmsfpeople_info h on b.id=h.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN cx_Info i on b.id=i.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN sfpeople_info j on b.id=j.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN sqjzpeople_info k on b.id=k.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN zszh_info l on b.id=l.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN xd_info m on b.id=m.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN azb_info n on b.id=n.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN zdqsn_info o on b.id=o.person_baseinfo_id where a.id=#{userid}
